title: Deflection output circuits
creator_contributor_role: Loucks and Norling Studios, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Equipment and supplies
description: Episode of Series "Basic Television". An explanation of vertical and horizontal output circuits for magnetic deflection, staring with the vertical output stages as a typical deflections amplifier. The first part pf the film shows how the sawtooth scanning current in the deflection coils corresponds to linear scanning of the electron beam; it explains oscillations and damping in the output circuit. The remainder of the film builds up the complete horizontal out-put circuit, step by step.
